thread.title: Ivanka Trump Reported to Have Stepped Down as Murdoch Trustee
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump Reported to Have Stepped Down as Murdoch Trustee

author: RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA
title: Ivanka Trump Reported to Have Stepped Down as Murdoch Trustee
text: Continue reading the main story Photo Ivanka Trump during a meeting with business executives in the State Dining Room of the White House last week. Credit Brendan Smialowski/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images Ivanka Trump served for several years as a trustee for a fortune set aside for the daughters of Rupert Murdoch , people familiar with the arrangement said. Her role highlights the close ties between President Trump’s family and the family that controls Fox News Channel, The Wall Street Journal and other news outlets. Ms. Trump, the president’s daughter, stepped down in December as a Murdoch trustee, a relationship reported on Wednesday by The Financial Times . The trust for the Murdoch daughters holds some $300 million in stock in News Corp. and 21st Century Fox: companies that Mr. Murdoch, 85, leads, and in which he and his family hold controlling interests.
